title: The Dark Awakening
description: One year ago, Mercy was the victim of a brutal attack. Now, she faces a new threat that lurks in the shadows of her fear, and there’s no one to trust.Secrets begin to reveal themselves to Mercy, and she’s thrown into a haunting, supernatural world. Vampires, witches, and werewolves roam the land, and as newfound power grows within her, Mercy must decide where her heart and strength lie. To become a warrior and fight the monsters who thirst for her blood, or to open her heart to love and the man in her dreams—visions of her past life she doesn’t remember.
author: Diana B. Lynn
